title: Please buy Sightstone
body: Why do AP supports think that they could just not buy a Sightstone and the game will go fine. I've had so many AP supports just go ruby crystal into Rod of Ages instead of just buying a sight stone. Do People really think that extra 100 ap is going to save your entire team from a gank they don't see coming. Even when I ask nicely they just say stop telling me what to build even though their lane is getting camped because they have no wards.

replies.body: i play mostly ap supports and i always get a ruby sightstone, it might not be asap (unless we start on the rough end) but i will have it and until i have my sight stone you better believe im buying pinks everytime i back until i have it.
